articles.title: Ron DeSantis says he will refuse any extradition request after Trump indictment: 'Questionable circumstances' - Fox News
articles.description: DeSantis said his state of Florida will not assist in extradition. The governor slammed the charges against Donald Trump calling them "un-American."
